snippet.title: prologue of a dreaming world
snippet.description:
This and other stories available at:
https://quiesphere.itch.io/sotdw

✦ ✦ ✦

And so, all that was left was nothing.

And from nothing, or perhaps, from an unuttered wish, was born something.
From an end, a beginning.

The story of a world.

✦ ✦ ✦

Stories of the Dreaming World is a collection of short stories put together in RPG Maker VX Ace. Though some of them may seem unrelated, they are small pieces of a bigger puzzle.

The stories follow the perspectives of different characters involved with a certain world.
An immortal alchemist. The fledgling god of a newborn world. A homunculus and the weight of knowing.

And perhaps more?

✦ ✦ ✦

🌼 MUSIC 🌼
H/Mix Gallery → https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNPMwbX6-SclEmvFX5_ihCw
Music Egg → https://ontama-m.com/
YouFulca → https://wingless-seraph.net/en/
Bird sounds by ivolipa

🌼 SCRIPTS 🌼
Yanfly → http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Main_Page
Galv → https://galvs-scripts.com/
Raizen → https://raizen884.itch.io/

🌼 ARTWORK, STORY 🌼
Yomi → https://quiesphere.itch.io/

Thank you for watching!
